revised_title: Mixed Triammonias Containing Monatomic and Diatomic Radicals
tldr: The author investigates the formation and properties of mixed triammonias containing monatomic and diatomic radicals, focusing on diethylene-triamine and triethylene-triamine. The study explores their reactions with iodides, bromides, and other compounds, leading to the discovery of various new nitrogen-based bases and salts.
